text: Colobothea hirtipes is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by DeGeer in 1775. It is known from Bolivia, Brazil, Guyana, French Guiana, Surinam, and Peru.BioLib.cz - Colobothea hirtipes. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1775
title: Colobothea hirtipes
